members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
SQL Server implementation of the abstract DataProvider class
This concreted data provider class provides the implementation of the abstract methods from data dataprovider.cs
In most cases you will only modify the Public methods region below.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: P:RI.Modules.RIStore_Services.SendEmail.Priority
member.summary: Priority of emails to be sent

member.name: P:RI.Modules.RIStore_Services.SendEmail.Subject
member.summary: Subject of the emails to be sent

member.name: P:RI.Modules.RIStore_Services.SendEmail.Body
member.summary: body text of the email to be sent
member.remarks: may contain HTML tags and tokens. Side effect: sets BodyFormat autmatically

member.name: P:RI.Modules.RIStore_Services.SendEmail.BodyFormat
member.summary: format of body text for the email to be sent.
member.remarks: by default activated, if tokens are found in Body and subject.

member.name: P:RI.Modules.RIStore_Services.SendEmail.PortalAlias
member.summary: portal alias http path to be used for links to images, ...

member.name: P:RI.Modules.RIStore_Services.SendEmail.SendingUser
member.summary: UserInfo of the user sending the mail
member.remarks: if not set explicitely, currentuser will be used

member.name: P:RI.Modules.RIStore_Services.SendEmail.ReplyTo
member.summary: email of the user to be shown in the mail as replyTo address
member.remarks: if not set explicitely, sendingUser will be used

member.name: P:RI.Modules.RIStore_Services.SendEmail.RemoveDuplicates
member.summary: shall duplicate email addresses be ignored? (default value: false)
member.remarks: Duplicate Users (e.g. from multiple role selections) will always be ignored.

member.name: M:RI.Modules.RIStore_Services.SendEmail.ConditionallyAddUser(DotNetNuke.Entities.Users.UserInfo,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}@,System.Collections.Generic.List{DotNetNuke.Entities.Users.UserInfo}@)
member.summary: add a user to the userlist, if it is not already in there
member.param: list of key (either email addresses or userid's)
member.remarks: for use by Recipients method only

member.name: M:RI.Modules.RIStore_Services.SendEmail.MatchLanguageFilter(System.String)
member.summary: check, if the user's language matches the current language filter
member.remarks: if filter not set, true is returned

member.name: M:RI.Modules.RIStore_Services.SendEmail.SetSMTPServer(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Specify SMTP server to be used
member.param: username to log in SMTP server
password to log in SMTP server
SSL used to connect tp SMTP server
member.remarks: if not called, values will be taken from host settings

member.summary: Add a single attachment file to the email
member.remarks: only local stored files can be added with a path

member.remarks: emaiol will be used for addressing, other properties might be used for TokenReplace

member.summary: Add all members of a role to recipient list

member.returns: List of userInfo objects, who receive the bulk mail
member.remarks: user.Email used for sending, other properties might be used for TokenReplace

member.name: T:RI.Modules.RIStore_Services.Business_Controller
member.summary:
The Controller class for RIStore_Settings
The FeatureController class is defined as the BusinessController in the manifest file (.dnn) DotNetNuke will poll this class to find out which Interfaces the class implements.
The IPortable interface is used to import/export content from a DNN module
The ISearchable interface is used by DNN to index the content of a module
The IUpgradeable interface allows module developers to execute code during the upgrade process for a module.
Below you will find stubbed out implementations of each, uncomment and populate with your own data
